name: Rolling Thunder 3
summary:
Rolling Thunder 3 is a 1993 run and gun video game published by Namco released for the Sega Genesis. It is a sequel to Rolling Thunder 2.
The game was made specifically for home consoles, unlike the previous two games in the series. Also unlike its predecessors, Rolling Thunder 3 was released only in North America.
